title: The Orb of Chaos Vol. 1: No Rest for the Wicked
description: Soliere Forrester has a plan, and that plan is to get rich. However, the details of that plan are still a work in progress. His latest scheme involves him and his best friend, Oather, venturing down into the dangerous Ruins of Tyric Nor; where it is said there are riches beyond your dreams and death around every corner. His plan gets derailed when he bumps into an old friend, Serieve, who manages to get them swept away to another land. Suddenly, they are caught up in the middle of plot by the evil King Nicholas to assemble an ancient unholy artifact that will enable to destroy all life in the land. Now, they must work with the other unfortunate souls who have been stranded there --a strange wizard, an elf, a priest and a particularly irritating assassin named Andrea-- to stop Nicholas before he destroys everything they hold dear. Sol knew he should have stayed in bed that morning, but alas, thereâ€™s just No Rest for the Wicked.
author: M. Ray Allen
